item.title: Computing data in org-mode table by means sql and R
item.description: Usually I prepare some personal reports and some shorts analysis as well. The Jupyter-Notebook is an amazing tool, however sometimes I just wanna a simple plain text. I use EMACS org-mode to organize my agenda and to manage my projects. So, Why not use org-mode tables in EMACS? At the begin I thought it was complicate, but actually not. With source code blocks in EMACS is possible to run several languages.
